text: == Events == * Pontius Pilate is called back to Rome. He had stopped a Samaritan uprising. * L. Vitellius defeated Artabanus of Parthia in support of another clamaint to the throne, Tiridates III. * Herod Antipas is remarried. * Marcellus becomes governor of Judaea and Samaria. * In MesoAmerica, last calendar monument created for about a century and a half. == Births == * == Deaths == * Thrasyllus of Mendes * Jesus (according to some theories) Category:30s
